text:
Good morning
Whats a good and practical way to deal with resubscriptions when DOI and subscriptions are managed externally in a shop? As far as I see the API cannot resubscribe.
Does anyone have example implementation of Visitor Identification API?
I am unable to get it working
It works in postman api though
I am using this script on the client side, can someone point where should we host this snippet?
I already checked both marketplaces and i haven't find nothing
Do you know the first steps for make an integration?
Which language do i have to use, documentation...
thank you
actually it did not work. The page itself is shown but in this page I have an iframe with a pdf and that does not show

This code will compromise your entire CRM account if you deploy it on the Internet. I, for one, am not going to be able to provide support with this until you use a more secure approach to implementing it.

<@UFBNA9K9A>

Any language you want as long as it has REST API support.

Call these APIs or use an SDK in a supported language:

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/overview>

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/how-to-use-HubSpot-api>

<https://github.com/HubSpot?q=api&type=&language=>
We can help you if you have tech background and specific dev / code questions, but otherwise you will probably have to hire some help

You should store your API key in the heroku app you are marking the API call so you don’t have to expose it via the client (browser). I would also recommend you implement some type of check in heroku to not blindly proxy any request through and append your HubSpot API key too it

Hi guys ! Is it possible to get the Hubl Markup/Code of a published page via API ? :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks !
Hello monsters of code! Is it possíble to create a api that retrieve data from lists? I can only find ways to get contacts at HubSpot web site.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/cms-apis>
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/lists/contact-lists-overview>
magic

<@UFBNA9K9A> <@UD53A9UUR> I have this same problem only it happens if I try to create a property that is a currency amount (`showCurrencySymbol`). Can you guys have a look whatever happened with this report of the problem:

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Unable-to-create-a-custom-contact-property-with-formField-set-to/td-p/344585>
Because of it I have a few dozen fields I made today that are number but not currency and it's a downer
